SELECT brp.nid AS nid, brp.borrow_nid AS borrowNid, u1.user_id AS borrowUserId, u1.username AS borrowUserName, binfo. NAME AS borrowName, b.project_Type AS projectType, bpt.borrow_name AS projectTypeName, hic.inst_name AS instName, CASE WHEN b.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '个月') END AS borrowPeriod, b.borrow_Apr AS borrowApr, t.account AS borrowAccount, b.borrow_account_yes AS borrowAccountYes, bs. NAME AS repayType, brp.recover_period AS recoverPeriod, u2.user_id AS recoverUserId, u2.username AS recoverUserName, t.account AS recoverTotal, brp.recover_capital AS recoverCapital, brp.recover_interest AS recoverInterest, brp.recover_account AS recoverAccount, brp.recover_fee AS recoverFee, brp.charge_interest, brp.charge_days, brp.delay_days, brp.delay_interest, brp.late_days, brp.late_interest, brp.recover_account, brp.recover_account_yes, brp.recover_status AS STATUS, IF ( brp.recover_yestime = '' OR brp.recover_yestime = '0' OR brp.recover_yestime = 'null', '', FROM_UNIXTIME( brp.recover_yestime, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) AS recoverActionTime,
IF ( brp.recover_time = '' OR brp.recover_time = '0' OR brp.recover_time = 'null', '', FROM_UNIXTIME( brp.recover_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) AS recoverLastTime, brp.repay_batch_no AS repay_batch_no FROM ht_borrow AS b
INNER JOIN ht_borrow_recover_plan AS brp ON b.borrow_nid = brp.borrow_nid
INNER JOIN ht_borrow_recover AS brp ON b.borrow_nid = brp.borrow_nid
INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info AS binfo ON b.borrow_nid = binfo.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_tender AS t ON brp.tender_id = t.id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style AS bs ON b.borrow_style = bs.nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = b.project_type LEFT JOIN ht_r_user AS u1 ON brp.borrow_userid = u1.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_r_user AS u2 ON brp.user_id = u2.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic ON hic.inst_code = binfo.inst_code
ORDER BY brp.recover_time ASC,b.id ASC
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ht_borrow AS b
INNER JOIN ht_borrow_recover_plan AS brp ON b.borrow_nid = brp.borrow_nid
INNER JOIN ht_borrow_recover AS brp ON b.borrow_nid = brp.borrow_nid
INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info AS binfo ON b.borrow_nid = binfo.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_tender AS t ON brp.tender_id = t.id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style AS bs ON b.borrow_style = bs.nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = b.project_type LEFT JOIN ht_r_user AS u1 ON brp.borrow_userid = u1.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_r_user AS u2 ON brp.user_id = u2.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic ON hic.inst_code = binfo.inst_code

SELECT SUM(brp.recover_capital) AS recoverCapital, SUM(brp.recover_interest) AS recoverInterest, SUM(brp.recover_account) AS recoverAccount, SUM(brp.recover_fee) AS recoverFee FROM ht_borrow AS b
INNER JOIN ht_borrow_recover_plan AS brp ON b.borrow_nid = brp.borrow_nid
INNER JOIN ht_borrow_recover AS brp ON b.borrow_nid = brp.borrow_nid
INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info AS binfo ON b.borrow_nid = binfo.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_tender AS t ON brp.tender_id = t.id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style AS bs ON b.borrow_style = bs.nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = b.project_type LEFT JOIN ht_r_user AS u1 ON brp.borrow_userid = u1.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_r_user AS u2 ON brp.user_id = u2.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic ON hic.inst_code = binfo.inst_code
